htsjdk.samtools.cram.encoding.readfeatures

Interface ReadFeature

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseQualityScore, Bases, Deletion, HardClip, InsertBase, Insertion, Padding, ReadBase, RefSkip, Scores, SoftClip, Substitution

    public interface ReadFeature
    An interface to capture data in read coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Read features are distinguished by operator, similar to cigar operator.
